purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 铝)
Pictophonetic: 吕 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:

    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 吕 [ lǚ ] a musical note; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: In the future you can get an indestructable metal spine made from aluminum.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: These days you can get a replacement metal knee but in the future you can get a metal spine.  Just make sure it's not a cheap doctor using aluminum!
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze text from " Gold " from " Lu ". " Aluminum " is " Lu " newcomer word, " Lu " this as " Lu ", like the shape of gold Ping, add " gold " next to the symbol for righteousness. The glyph can be left and right structure, or it can be written as upper and lower structure, with " Lu " above and " Gold " below. The same " Lü " is used in the inscriptions to indicate a metal used to cast bronze ware. As mysterious liu husband aluminum Ge: "Xuan Liu (pure gold) Fu (Fu) with aluminum", " pure gold ", " Fu " and " aluminum " are all metal.

Western Han Dynasty Yangxiong's "Dialect": "Here, Shuo, Moye. Yanqi Mo aluminum is called Xi." The " aluminum " here means Mocuo , which is a variant of "鑢". "Said Wen": "Yuan, wrong copper and iron." "Yu Pian": "Yuan, or aluminum." "Guang Ya. "Shi Gu San" "Yang, Mo Ye", Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Yang, 锏, aluminum are the same."

The modern chemical element aluminum is also called " aluminum ", but it is only in the same form as the previous inscriptions " aluminum " and the wrong meaning of " aluminum ". It was created by people in different periods from the " gold " and " lu ". The usage of words is also different. (See Li Rong)
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " Gold " from " Lu ". " Aluminum " is " Lu " newcomer word, " Lu " this as " Lu ", like the shape of gold Ping, add " gold " next to the symbol for righteousness. The same " Lü " is used in the inscriptions to indicate a metal used to cast bronze ware. Bronze " aluminum " and the Western Han Dynasty "dialect" in the " aluminum " modern chemical element " Al " just homoglyph.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「金」從「呂」。「鋁」是「呂」的後起字，「呂」本作「吕」，象金鉼之形，後加「金」旁為義符。字形可作左右結構，亦可寫為上下結構，上「呂」下「金」。金文裡用同「呂」，表示一種金屬，用來鑄造銅器。如玄鏐夫鋁戈：「玄翏（鏐）夫（鈇）鋁之用。」「鏐」、「鈇」和「鋁」皆為金屬。

　　西漢揚雄《方言》：「希、鑠，摩也。燕齊摩鋁謂之希。」這裡的「鋁」表示摩錯，是「鑢」的異體字。《說文》：「鑢，錯銅鐵也。」《玉篇》：「鑢，或作鋁。」《廣雅．釋詁三》「鑢，磨也」，王念孫疏證：「鑢、鐧、鋁並同。」

　　現代化學元素aluminium也稱為「鋁」，但和前面金文「鋁」、摩錯義的「鋁」只屬同形字，是不同時期的人分別造的從「金」從「呂」的形聲字，用法也不同。（參李榮）
humanum_short_description: 金文從「金」從「呂」。「鋁」是「呂」的後起字，「呂」本作「吕」，象金鉼之形，後加「金」旁為義符。金文裡用同「呂」，表示一種金屬，用來鑄造銅器。金文「鋁」和西漢《方言》裡的「鋁」、現代化學元素「鋁」只是同形字。

lv3
HSK 2: 旅
HSK 6: 侶,屢,履,屡,侣
(Simplified: 铝)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 吕 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 吕 [ lǚ ] a musical note; surname
①一種金屬元素，質地堅韌而輕，有延展性，容易導電。可作飛機、車輛、船、舶、火箭的結構材料。純鋁可做超高電壓的電纜。做日用器皿的鋁通常稱“鋼精”、“鋼種(zhǒng)”。
(Simplified: 铝)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 吕 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
Chinese: In the future you can get an indestructable metal spine made from aluminum.
Meaning: aluminum
Hanzi: 铝
Story: These days you can get a replacement metal knee but in the future you can get a metal spine. Just make sure it's not a cheap doctor using aluminum!
Kind: traditional

金文從「 金 」從「 呂 」。「 鋁 」是「 呂 」的後起字，「 呂 」本作「 吕 」，象金鉼之形，後加「 金 」旁為義符。字形可作左右結構，亦可寫為上下結構，上「 呂 」下「 金 」。金文裡用同「 呂 」，表示一種金屬，用來鑄造銅器。如玄鏐夫鋁戈：「玄翏（鏐）夫（鈇）鋁之用。」「 鏐 」、「 鈇 」和「 鋁 」皆為金屬。 西漢揚雄《方言》：「希、鑠，摩也。燕齊摩鋁謂之希。」這裡的「 鋁 」表示摩錯，是「 鑢 」的異體字。《說文》：「鑢，錯銅鐵也。」《玉篇》：「鑢，或作鋁。」《廣雅．釋詁三》「鑢，磨也」，王念孫疏證：「鑢、鐧、鋁並同。」 現代化學元素aluminium也稱為「 鋁 」，但和前面金文「 鋁 」、摩錯義的「 鋁 」只屬同形字，是不同時期的人分別造的從「 金 」從「 呂 」的形聲字，用法也不同。（參李榮）
Bronze text from " Gold" from " Lu". " Aluminum" is " Lu" newcomer word, " Lu" this as " Lu", like the shape of gold Ping, add " gold" next to the symbol for righteousness. The glyph can be left and right structure, or it can be written as upper and lower structure, with " Lu" above and " Gold" below. The same " Lü" is used in the inscriptions to indicate a metal used to cast bronze ware. As mysterious liu husband aluminum Ge: "Xuan Liu (pure gold) Fu (Fu) with aluminum", " pure gold", " Fu" and " aluminum" are all metal. Western Han Dynasty Yangxiong's "Dialect": "Here, Shuo, Moye. Yanqi Mo aluminum is called Xi." The " aluminum" here means Mocuo, which is a variant of " 鑢". "Said Wen": "Yuan, wrong copper and iron." "Yu Pian": "Yuan, or aluminum." "Guang Ya. "Shi Gu San" "Yang, Mo Ye", Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Yang, 锏, aluminum are the same." The modern chemical element aluminum is also called " aluminum", but it is only in the same form as the previous inscriptions " aluminum" and the wrong meaning of " aluminum". It was created by people in different periods from the " gold" and " lu". The usage of words is also different. (See Li Rong)

鋁字的基本解释

鋁
lǚ
见“铝”。

鋁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bù］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)无，没有。
(2)非，不是。
(3)不到，未。
(4)副词。表否定。
(5)副词。表禁止。勿，不要。
(6)副词。单用，做否定性的回答。
(7)副词。方言。用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等。
(8)副词。用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果。
(9)副词。“不”字的前后叠用相同的名词，表示不在乎或不相干。
(10)副词。跟“便”“就”搭用，表示选择。
(11)副词。方言。不用；不要（限用于某些套语）。
(12)助词。无义。用以足句或加强语气。
(13)助词。无义。表示反问语气。
(14)通“丕”。大。
[②]［fǒu］
［《廣韻》方久切，上有，非。］
同“否1”。
[③]［fōu］
［《廣韻》甫鳩切，平尤，非。］
姓。汉有不疑。见《後汉书·皇甫规传》。
[④]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
花蒂。
[⑤]［pǐ］
［《韻补》補美切，上紙］
通“否2”。<

aluminum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bù］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) No, no.
(2) No, no.
(3) No, no.
(4) Adverbs. Table negation.
(5) Adverbs. Table prohibited. Don't, don't.
(6) Adverbs. Use it alone to make a negative answer.
(7) Adverbs. dialect. Used at the end of a sentence to express a question, it is equivalent to a repeated question.
(8) Adverbs. Used in the middle of the dynamic compensation structure, it means that it is impossible to achieve a certain result.
(9) Adverbs. The same nouns are used before and after the word "bu", which means that they don't care or are irrelevant.
(10) Adverbs. Used with "convenience" and "just" to indicate choice.
(11) Adverbs. dialect. No; don't (limited to certain phrases).
(12) Particles. Meaningless. Use full sentences or to strengthen the tone.
(13) Particles. Meaningless. Indicates a rhetorical tone.
(14) Link "Pi". Big.
[②]［fǒu］
["Guangyun" Fang Jiu cut, there is no. ]
Same as "No 1".
[③] [fōu]
["Guangyun" Fu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Fei. ]
name. Han has no doubts. See "Book of the Later Han·Huangfu Rules Biography".
[④]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
Flower pedicle.
[⑤] [pǐ]
["Yunbu" to make up the beauty and cut, put on paper]
Pass "No 2".
